comment._content:
New York District Attorney Lewis Smith lead the prosecution in the trial against Florence Carman

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
Defense attorney George Levy makes a statement for Mrs. carman:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5716091988/in/photostream/]

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: However, this photo is before the trial which was held in October, 1914, either at the coroner's inquest or the grand jury proceeding at which Mrs. Carman was indicted.

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: Thanks trialsanderrors, Wystan, and artolog for the additional details about this image relating to the Carman murder case. Based on date of 7/7/14 which is written on the negative, it would appear that this image of  District Attorney Lewis Smith was taken before the trial of Mrs. Edwin Carman for the murder of Lulu Bailey.
